alert.note: Alert for Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 4:44PM CDT until September 19 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wise County in north central Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 444 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles west of Sanger, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenwood and Slidell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
